troubleshooting.title: Compatibility Issue Between Java and Certain Graphics Card Drivers

condition.title: Problem
condition.p: Under certain settings, a compatibility issues can appear between Java and some graphics card drivers, which results in the text from the editor (in Author or Text mode) being displayed garbled.

steps-informal.p: If you encounter this problem, update your graphics card driver. Another possible workaround is, , go to Appearance Fonts , and set the value of the Text antialiasing option to ON.If this workaround does not resolve the problem, set the Text antialiasing option to other values.
